story.iWant: see project cards with high-fidelity Glassmorphism effects
story.soThat: the portfolio feels premium and visually stunning

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: - 1. BentoCard component created with a high-fidelity glass effect. - 2. Backdrop blur (backdrop-filter: blur(12px)) applied. - 3. Thin, semi-transparent borders (rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)) implemented. - 4. Subtle inner shadows and gradients added to enhance depth. - 5. Project images are lazily loaded within the cards. - 6. Cards support different grid spans (e.g., 2x2 for featured, 1x1 for small).
